data.title: Leadership
data.content: Enabled with blockchain, AI / ML & Web 3.0-based apps

data.title: Business Life Sciences
data.content: Helping businesses transform digitally and create new value

data.skills: MongoDB, SQL queries, tables, events, Database migration
responsibities: Database Architecture & Normalization
DB performance monitoring
Database migration
Backup & Recovery
Ensure availability, reliability, and security of the database in production and staging environments
Ensure data integrity and the detection of data errors
Perform capacity planning for database growth
Train and mentor application developers and junior personnel on best practices
Develop diagrams for data structure entity relationships and data flows
Prepare reports for databases and customize for specific needs
Collaborate with other database developers to assess system performance and make modifications as required
desiredprofile: At least 2 years of experience in in Mongo database management with designing and developing SQL queries, tables, events, stored
Should have strong skills in design & maintain the existing/new databases and ensure their stability, reliability, security and performance
Understanding of MongoDB underlying storage engines, such as InnoDB and MyISAM experience with replication configuration in MongoDB
Proficient in writing and optimizing Mongo Statements
Should provide database and code optimization recommendations
Should have good logical skills to understand database design, implementations, relations, queries
Experience in debugging time critical DB problems like deadlock analysis and transaction locking
Experience in Engineering solutions for data backup and encryption
Good communication skills and ability to work with remote teams
Exposure to Mongo DB native plugin development is an added advantage

data.skills: Business Development, B2C Sales, Enterprise Sales, Technical Sales, Client Retention, Client Relationship
responsibities: Prospecting, Introducing, generating interest to on-boarding of clients through extensive market research, compelling proposals and informing solution offering
Building a pipeline of high quality with recurring revenue
Developing long-term strategic relationships with key accounts and exceeding quarterly revenue and targets
Accelerating sales by engaging Founders, CxO(s) through well-developed sales engagement tools
Driving the development of account plans for larger clients
Hunting, leading, inspiring, and driving strategic initiatives for the targeted account
Qualifying opportunities, managing the RFP process, and closing business
Creating, maintaining, and executing a business plan for the assigned accounts with goals and objectives, based on opportunity and customer needs
Implementing marketing strategies by analyzing trends, market mapping, and competitor analysis effective decisions
Establishing key propositions in Client's offerings to the Decision makers with sales head
Gathering information on account through various tools and their investment strategy and planning for the upcoming years for participating in RFP
Leading pursuit marketing programs for large deals to define their value proposition and strengthen it with fitting marketing tactics to increase the probability
Demonstrating Digital Transformation solutions
Drawing overall cloud approach and strategy based on customer expectations and business KPIs
Briefing teams on the details for advancing cloud skill development and facilitating screening of candidates to enhance partner relationships
Taking bi-weekly/monthly status meetings to communicate account revenue growth
Executing corporate initiatives and industry events resulting in new business attraction
Capitalizing market opportunities by partnering with cross-functional teams to accelerate account growth
Leading product growth & expansion of cloud connectivity portfolio
Working closely with internal business, operations and partnerships teams in launching and maintaining features that impact product growth

Driving market and usability research to understand opportunities and developing roadmap & strategy alongwith customer engagements for understanding the use-case and working with pre-sales for the best fit solution
Working closely with engineers, designers and other PMs on developing new features/specs and driving execution

Designing and implementing device accreditation programs to serve customers with improved product delivery processes, impact analysis, risk management and communication across the organization and fixing revenue leakage
Responsibility will also include operational improvements, RoI analysis, GTM, product value proposition, customer analytics
Liaisoning with Partners / Vendors for product roadmap and solutions
Analyzing feature/experiment results and communicating learnings to the team and the company
Creating Cost/Benefit modeling and business cases for large scale proposals
Go to Market (GTM) activities and creating proposal accelerators for driving efficiency
Running end-to-end sales cycle to meet revenue target
Coordinating with the Delivery team for smooth project delivery
Building and managing relationships to generate new business and closure
Ensuring the deliverables are of the highest quality with adherence to established technical standards
desiredprofile: In-depth understanding of Private/Hybrid Cloud solutions
Experience in maintaining databases in CRM through various search engines
Should have worked with Sales leadership to design, create, and present business solutions in the domestic/international market
Related Cloud Certifications will add additional advantage
Highly adaptable professional
Ability to quickly learn new technologies and systems, coupled with a genuine passion for business development
Should be able to diagnose and solve technical problems
Proficient in managing administration of B2C business
Committed to excellence, self-motivation, quick learner, team player, problem solver, analytical and excellent communication skills
data.education: Any Technical Graduate/Post Graduate (B.Tech/B.E/MCA), MBA in Marketing is preferred

data.skills: Web Application Testing, Automation Testing, Web Security Audit/tool, Agile Methodologies, JIRA
responsibities: Lead QA team on overall testing activities approaches and strategies
Establish, maintain, and oversee all aspects of QA processes and methodologies to ensure effectiveness and alignment to industry best practices
Manage proper execution by the QA team on different types of testing (functional, integration, end-to-end, performance, etc)
Facilitate and lead regular QA team meetings or triage calls
Coordinate the maintenance of test environments
Work with project manager and development team to report and escalate relevant testing issues and challenges that arise during testing activities
Collaborate with QA Engineers to develop effective strategies and test plans
Evaluate product code according to Specifications
Create logs to document testing phases and defects
Report bugs to development teams
Help troubleshoot issues
Conduct post-release/post-implementation testing
Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development
Excellent communications skills verbally and written (English)
desiredprofile: At Least 5 year of experience web application, testing and documentation
Should have worked on web application testing, design and documentation of the system
Experience in web security audit/tool
Solid experience in Agile testing methodologies
Excellent communication skills
Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude
Strong organizational skills
Candidates must have experience in JIRA
Experience and good understanding of automation testing and frameworks
Must have Experience in client coordination / Team Handling

data.skills: Javascript, React JS, Redux, MySQL, Oracle, MongoDB, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS
responsibities: Developing front end website architecture
Designing user interactions on web pages
Creating servers and databases for functionality
Ensuring cross-platform optimization for mobile phones
Ensuring responsiveness of applications
Working alongside graphic designers for web design features
Seeing through a project from conception to finished product
Designing and developing APIs
Meeting both technical and consumer needs
Staying abreast of developments in web applications and programming languages
Must have worked with enterprise business applications
desiredprofile: At Least 5 year of experience web application, testing and documentation
Should have worked on web application testing, design and documentation of the system
Experience in web security audit/tool

Excellent communication skills

Must have Experience in client coordination / Team Handling

data.skills: Flask & ORMs as Django, SQL Alchemy, SQL Queries, Debugging Techniques, APIs, Automation Testing, Github, Gitlab, Bit Bucket
responsibities: Writing effective, Scalable code
Developing back-end components to improve responsiveness and overall performance
Integrating user-facing elements into applications
Testing and debugging programs
Improving functionality of existing systems
Assessing and prioritizing feature requests
Coordinating with internal teams to understand user requirements and provide technical solutions
desiredprofile: Any Technical Graduate/Postgraduate
Minimum 5+ Years with Team Handling
Working knowledge of constructs like Iterators, Generators, Decorators, Descriptors, IO Loop
Must have Experience in Flask to develop REST compliant APIs
Experience with packaging and deployment tools like Wheels and Fabric is a big plus
Can apply design principles and design patterns to your code in a practical way
Knowledge of working with ORMs like SQL Alchemy or Django ORM
Working experience in writing automated tests using unit test and nose test
Good working experience in database modeling and can write advanced SQL Queries
Deep knowledge of troubleshooting and debugging techniques like divide & conquer, time profiling and Memory Profiling
Having a Public repository in Git hub/Git lab/bit bucket will be preferred

data.skills: PHP Framework viz. Yii / Laravel/ Cake PHP/ Core PHP / Codignitor, MySQL, OOPS Programming
responsibities: As a PHP Developer, you will be responsible for developing and coding all server-side logic
You will also be required to maintain the central database and respond to requests from Front - end developers
Conducting analysis of website and application requirements
Writing back-end code and building efficient PHP modules
Developing back-end portals with an optimized database
Troubleshooting application and code issues
Integrating data storage solutions
Responding to integration requests from front-end developers
Finalizing back-end features and testing web applications
Updating and altering application features to enhance performance
desiredprofile: Must have experience in developing rich UI base web applications using HTML web standards , AJAX, Java Script libraries and frameworks such as JQuery & Prototype etc
Experience in building high - scalable custom websites
Should have strong Data base Knowledge
Should have worked in Agile Scrum framework
Should know about writing a secure code
Excellent Communicator m self - motivator, team player ability to solve complex problems, design requirements Documentation, etc

data.skills: Architecture Design, Data Solution Debugging, Code Version Tool like Git/SVN, RDBMS (PostgreSQL, MySQL)
responsibities: Responsible for all aspects of development, designing, and delivery of database solutions
Administer and maintain database security, integrity, and optimization
Develop and run periodic and requested reports
Develop new databases and applications
Identify and resolve performance and capacity issues
Establish and maintain backup and recovery processes
Maintain associated non-referential data
desiredprofile: 5+ years of experience as DB Manager

Experience in architecture designing, development of standards, data solution debugging, developing coordination with developing a team, lending support to various technology and business teams, supporting and meeting data and database systems and meeting business needs and specifications
Should have an in-depth knowledge of data manipulation techniques and computer programming, the ability to integrate and implement new software packages and new products into the system
Should have good organizational skills and communication skills
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as {{Git / Mercurial / SVN}}
Should be proficient in Database with specific understanding of RDBMS like PostgreSQL, MySQL (or similar)

data.skills: Node Js, Ajax, JQuery, Javascript, API, Gateway Integration, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Functional Testing, MVC
responsibities: Responsible for leading the team of developers of client and overall operationalization and maintenance of portals
Responsible for overall designing and developing software systems and applications
Responsible for the overall operationalization and maintenance of Client portals
Responsible for optimizing the application architecture while following Agile methodologies
Work with client and other stakeholders closely to consult and develop holistic technical solutions in data Engineering & integration, application development and quality processes
Should be able to maintain architecture design and enable modifications such that the cloud architecture of client portals remains technology agnostic

Ensure that the applications are easily scalable and portable across available public-private cloud infrastructure and should leverage government cloud infrastructure from C-DAC and NIC to the extent possible
Prepare System documents such as SRS, FRS etc
Understand and optimize the application architecture while following Agile methodologies
Understand user stories of Client from product owners and drive the design and development accordingly
Should lead the entire cycle of software development i.e. from ideation to deployment and everything in between
Manage data and compute resources for language technology start-ups
Submit the weekly/monthly Report to the project head for all the team members working with him
desiredprofile: 5-10 Year development of software and Management of team
Working Experience of web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, JQuery etc
Working Experience of relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services using REST and SOAP architecture
Profound knowledge of documentation like requirement specifications, manuals and other project related documents
Experience in common third-party APIs (google, Facebook, SMS gateway integration, payment gateway integration etc)
Object Oriented Programming with the understanding of an MVC framework architecture and experience in development using MVC framework
Experience in handling web security audits and its tools
Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new ideas
Experience for working on software tools LAMP, versioning and bug reporting tools, web and database security
Experience in cross platform development, worked on products or technologies that have scalable architectures
Understanding and experience in complete SDLC from functional & technical specifications, documentation, QA processes, source control, maintenance and deployments
Understanding of W3C Web Standards/Semantics and Accessibility Guidelines
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as {{Git / Mercurial / SVN}}
Should be proficient in Database with specific understanding of RDBMS like PostgreSQL, MySQL (or similar)
Should be aware of agile delivery and should easily adapt to the process
Should be familiar with Performance testing (JMeter, Gatling), Functional testing (Taiko, Jest, gauge and PACT), Unit testing and Integration testing approaches
Hands on experience on project management tools & technologies including open sources
Experience of working for a government set up/ project is desirable
